description: Industry Lingo provided by Mr. Zi.
bgDescription: Lingo Collection - Part One Shoulder: buddy, man, friend. Make it Loud: State your name. The Silent: Who can't state the name. The Loud: Who have strong background. Outsiders: Who don't understand Lingo. Mingle: Use Lingo. Movers: Who have reputation. Shakers: Boss, leader. Pour the Water: Gimme the Money. Wipe Your Eyes: Take a good look. To the Far: Eyes. To the Wind: Ears. The Long: Legs. The Green: Weapons. Rod: Guns. ...
